result.execSummary:
Alondro Pratt was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Alondro Pratt was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alondro Pratt

records.addlTxt:
8:52 AM Prosecuting attorney Dirk Christian Jensen in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Alondro Pratt not in court. Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
Defendant has been extradited to State of Iowa.
BTC: Case dismissed.

9:39 AM Prosecuting attorney Diane M. Donohoo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Alondro Pratt in court, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth Martha Angove in court for Alondro Pratt. Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
State of Iowa req extradition.
Defendant does not contest.
Colloquy conducted with def re: right to hearing.
BTC:  The court finds that the defendant freely, voluntarily, knowingly, & intelligently waives extradition.
Status conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on July 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

9:39 AM Prosecuting attorney Diane M. Donohoo in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Alondro Pratt in court, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth Martha Angove in court for Alondro Pratt. Court Reporter:  Darlene Shue. 
State of Iowa req extradition.
Defendant does not contest.
Colloquy conducted with def re: right to hearing.
BTC:  The court finds that the defendant freely, voluntarily, knowingly, & intelligently waives extradition.
Status conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status conference on July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Extradition hearing on June 13, 2022 at 09:45 am.
